20110111030736.000|20110111030737.000|CC1|>> LET'S LISTEN TO SOMETHING    
20110111030737.000|20110111030738.000|CC1|ELSE CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORD SAID 
20110111030738.000|20110111030740.000|CC1|ON "THE DAILY RUNDOWN" BUILT    
20110111030740.000|20110111030741.000|CC1|POLITICAL CLIMATE.              
20110111030741.000|20110111030742.000|CC1|>> WHAT I CAN SAY IN THE YEARS  
20110111030742.000|20110111030744.000|CC1|THAT SOME OF MY COLLEAGUES HAVE 
20110111030744.000|20110111030746.000|CC1|SERVED, 20, 30 YEARS, THEY HAVE

20110111030749.000|20110111030753.000|CC1|BY NEGOTIATING, WORKING         
20110111030753.000|20110111030753.000|CC1|TOGETHER.

20110111033615.000|20110111033617.000|CC1|BUT NOTHING VIOLENT OR          
20110111033617.000|20110111033618.000|CC1|POLITICAL.                      
20110111033618.000|20110111033619.000|CC1|>> NOW, WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF THE
